text: w'idha 'adhaqna almushrikin ysrana wfrjana wrkha'an baed eusr wshdt wkrb asabhm, 'iidha hum ykdhdhibwn, wysthzywn biayat allh, qul -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almushrikin almsthzyyn: allah 'asrae mkrana wastdrajana weqwbt lkm. 'iina hafazatana aladhin nrslhm 'iilaykum yaktubun ealaykum ma tamkurun fi ayatna, thuma nhasbkm ealaa dhlk
